titleStmt.title: The everlasting truth exalted being a plain testimony unto the manifestations, growth and prosperity of truth : also some dangers opened and discovered in the not receiving truth, or having received it, departing from it : also a short testimony unto gospel meetings and fellowship ... / William Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, d. 1673.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
